data.title: Tercer Inventario Forestal Nacional. Ministerio de Agricultura, Alimentación y Medio Ambiente (España/Spain)
data.meta_description: Third national forest inventory carried out by the Service of Forest Inventory from 1997 to 2006 and published by the General Directorate of Natural Environment and Forestry Policy of the Ministry of Environment, Rural and Marine affairs. Based on field work and performed at province level. Iberian Peninsula and Balearic Islands: Datum ED50, UTM Projection, International Ellipsoid of 1924, HAYFORD 1909, Zone 30. Canary Islands: Datum WGS84, UTM Projection, Ellipsoid WGS84, Zone 28. 1:50.000-scale map. …Few plant names from the IFN3 considered synonyms of others accepted in Flora iberica/Anthos…
data.text:
Description

Third national forest inventory carried out by the Service of Forest Inventory from 1997 to 2006 and published by the General Directorate of Natural Environment and Forestry Policy of the Ministry of Environment, Rural and Marine affairs. Based on field work and performed at province level. Iberian Peninsula and Balearic Islands: Datum ED50, UTM Projection, International Ellipsoid of 1924, HAYFORD 1909, Zone 30. Canary Islands: Datum WGS84, UTM Projection, Ellipsoid WGS84, Zone 28. 1:50.000-scale map. …Few plant names from the IFN3 considered synonyms of others accepted in Flora iberica/Anthos were replaced by the accepted ones whenever they were homotypic synonyms. Also the Flora Iberica/Anthos criterion was followed regarding the scientific names spelling or authorship. …More info about IFN3 in: http://www.magrama.gob.es/es/biodiversidad/servicios/banco-datos-naturaleza/informacion-disponible/ifn3.aspx

Este juego de datos se adscribe actualmente al Ministerio para la Transición Ecológica y Reto Demográfico (MITERD) pero conserva la denominación del organismo que lo publicó en origen (Ministerio de Agricultura, Alimentación y Medio Ambiente).
